ðŸ“– Summary: The Polygon Screenshot Tool is a Windows service that allows users to capture screenshots of irregular shapes defined by drawing a polygon. It runs in the system tray, is activated by a global hotkey, and copies the captured image directly to the clipboard, offering a fast and lightweight solution for capturing specific areas of the screen.
